mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mymember (mem_id, mem_name, mem_tel, mem_addr, reg_dt) VALUES (#{memId}, #{memName}, #{memTel}, #{memAddr}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select mem_id as memId, mem_name as memName, mem_tel as memTel, mem_addr as memAddr from mymember
select count(*) as cnt from mymember where mem_id = #{memId}
